knimeNode.name: Grayscale Reconstruction
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reconstruct a grayscale or binary image from a marker image

fullDescription.intro:
Reconstruct area of all marked objects using either dilation ( what you probably want, expanding small objects to full size again ) or erosion (shrinking enlarged objects down to their original size).
Contributed by INCIDE, University of Konstanz

tab.name: options
tab.option: Use either four or eight connected grids.
Use either dilation or erosion operation for reconstruction.

ports.inPort: First image must be the original image, second image must be the marker image
